name: Enlightening Storm
description:
This is a serious (educational) game that teaches you how to react during a lightning storm, if you find yourself up in the mountain. Meet reincarnated mythological creatures, sleepy Bohemian novelists, urban legends, questionable fish and more, take note of their advice and descend the rainy mountain safely.

Controls can be found at the starting menu. Inside the game, you can open the help menu at any time ("H" button).

Credits:

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com, https://musopen.org, http://dig.ccmixter.org and https://www.bensound.com

SFX from https://freesound.org

Images from https://pixabay.com

Characters & Animations from https://www.mixamo.com/#/

The assets used were all free and downloaded from the Unity Asset Store.
